name.baseName: Soil remediation ; In-situ remediation ; Enhanced bioremediation ; Equipment operation ; Monitoring
土壤修复;原位修复;生物强化修复;设备运行;监测

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: CHC+ISB is used for site remediation, and during the equipment operation phase, monitoring takes place.
该数据集代表了原位生物强化修复（ISB）用于土壤修复的使用情况，特别是针对含有氯挥发性有机化合物（CVOCs）的含水层污染。它涵盖了修复过程中专业设备的操作和现场监测工作。该过程尤其适用于处理含氯挥发性有机化合物（CVOCs）的大面积和显著土壤深度的环境修复项目。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The aquifer in a certain area in Shanghai, China, is uniformly contaminated with chlorinated volatile organic compounds (CVOCs), with a surface area of 20,000 m2 and a depth of 50 m, with the water table located at a depth of 30 m.

technology.technologicalApplicability: This data set represents the use of in-situ enhanced bioremediation (ISB) for soil remediation, specifically aimed at treating chlorinated volatile organic compounds (CVOCs) contamination in an aquifer. It covers the operation of specialized equipment and site monitoring during the remediation process. This process is particularly relevant for environmental remediation projects dealing with CVOCs within larger surface areas and significant soil depths.
该数据集代表了原位生物强化修复（ISB）用于土壤修复的使用情况，特别是针对含有氯挥发性有机化合物（CVOCs）的含水层污染。它涵盖了修复过程中专业设备的操作和现场监测工作。该过程尤其适用于处理含氯挥发性有机化合物（CVOCs）的大面积和显著土壤深度的环境修复项目。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ni, Z. et al. Comparative Life-Cycle Assessment of Aquifer Thermal Energy Storage Integrated with in Situ Bioremediation of Chlorinated Volatile Organic Compounds. Environ. Sci. Technol. 54, 3039–3049 (2020).

Ni, Z. et al. Comparative Life-Cycle Assessment of Aquifer Thermal Energy Storage Integrated with in Situ Bioremediation of Chlorinated Volatile Organic Compounds. Environ. Sci. Technol. 54, 3039–3049 (2020).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set, ensure that the parameters are consistent with the specific site conditions such as the scale of contamination and the depth of the aquifer. Considerations should include local regulatory requirements for equipment operation and monitoring protocols. Users should account for potential variations in geology and hydrogeology between the dataset's origin location (Shanghai, China) and the application site. Water table depth, CVOCs distribution uniformity, and site-specific environmental factors may affect the applicability of the data.
使用此数据集时，确保参数与特定场地条件（如污染规模和含水层深度）一致。应该包括对设备操作和监测协议的本地监管要求的考虑。用户应考虑数据集源始地（中国上海）和应用现场之间在地质和水文地质方面的可能变异。地下水位深度、CVOCs分布均匀性以及现场特有的环境因素可能会影响数据的适用性。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
